attributes.action: Give Jack Young a Archway School IT services T-Shirt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jack Young should receive an Archway IT Services T-Shirt because he knows everything about computeres and he is a ledgend also he wants to be priminister so he can get rid of you and be an amazing ruler!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
